text:
Death threat to Cem Özdemir
Green Party politician Cem Özdemir has received death threats from the German Nuclear Weapons Association, a Neonazi group. Cem Özdemir, who had previously received death threats, had been given special protection.

02 Nov 2019, 16:14

According to the news in Funke newspaper connected to the Media Group, Turkey origin politicians at the end of October to the office of the German parliament Germany Nuclear Weapons Association (Atomwaffendivisio Deutschland-AWD) named in the e-mail sent by the Nazis group, Özdemir takes place during the first death list was expressed. According to the news e-mail, 'Right now, how and when we are making plans for execution, the next public show? Or will you be caught by us in your house? Dı
Özdemir'in e-mail, the Federal Security Agency (BKA) and the German parliament passed to the security units said. The 53-year-old politician took this death threat seriously because of the statements used.
